text:
The Darkwood Watch is House [[Cannith]]â€™s elite [[wandslinger]] soldiers. Ten members of the Watch are assigned to [[Sharn]]; the squad leader  is [[Menya d'Cannith]]. The Darkwood Watch is usually assigned to protect the [[Cannith Forgehold]], and they are only used for
extremely important tasks. As they are clearly recognizable as members of House Cannith, wandslingers are rarely used for covert operations.
title: Darkwood Watch
